Name: Serpent Scepter
Description: Mediating peace between those in dispute and hostility.

Name: Golden Fleece
Description: It is a reward for the adventurous and the bravest souls.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Mistilteinn
Description: It is the edge for the weak, the silent, and the belittled.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Fruit of Good and Evil
Description: It is the rebel vanguard for the disobedient and those who seek knowledge.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Page of Beastly Thirst
Description: They wept and they cried. They lived and they died.
Usage: The ritual of Beast Insight I.

Name: Scroll of Beastly Thirst
Description: They walked in the barrens, resting in the day and rising in the night.
Usage: The ritual of Beast Insight II.

Name: Tome of Beastly Thirst
Description: Their every breath feels like that of their mother's mother and their father's father. They see what the mortals see.
Usage: The ritual of Beast Insight III.

Name: Page of Plantal Vimen
Description: To reach the skies, its roots grow deep into the earth to extract nourishments from decomposed life.
Usage: The ritual of Plant Insight I.

Name: Scroll of Plantal Vimen
Description: It shall keep growing till it smothers the entire sky, till it chokes everysingle space, till the deep green tIde blankets everything in sight.
Usage: The ritual of Plant Insight II.

Name: Tome of Plantal Vimen
Description: It is the source of every twig in the deep woods, every strand of moss and floating weed and the mother of every tree. All of them know you.
Usage: The ritual of Plant Insight III.

Name: Page of Starlit Ascent
Description: Neither the moon nor the sun could rob it of its colors.
Usage: The ritual of Star Insight I.

Name: Scroll of Starlit Ascent
Description: It breeds infants and helps them sleep in peace. It is a friend of lengthy nights and fantasies.
Usage: The ritual of Star Insight II.

Name: Tome of Starlit Ascent
Description: An omen, a filthy secret, or an act of absolute vileness. You can also treat it as a handful of broken glass on black satin.
Usage: The ritual of Star Insight III.

Name: Page of Mineral Wealth
Description: They are buried deep under the mountain rocks where a gem is indistinguishable from bits of coal.
Usage: The ritual of Mineral Insight I.

Name: Scroll of Mineral Wealth
Description: The rock spits on those with a weak mind. It is the code between instant and eternity.
Usage: The ritual of Mineral Insight II.

Name: Tome of Mineral Wealth
Description: It is a steadfast guardian and an indestructible friend. Even the nobles would bow before this sonorous herald.
Usage: The ritual of Mineral Insight III.

Name: Golden Compass
Description: It will remove the wrong paths for you.

Name: Platinum Ouija
Description: It shall purge things that lead you astray.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Watch Core
Description: Through polishing, inlaying, and fine carving, one can obtain a lively "heart".

Name: Glowing Mothwing
Description: Please do not stimulate the light source at its tail. Handle gently to avoid burning.

Name: Murmur of Insanity
Description: You will get to read the most hidden, forbidden and forgotten spells in history among the mad words of this book. He is the best tutor for all the ambitious villains. Just remember one thing: ask only, and never answer.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Silver Bullet
Description: It takes effort to make one, but it's definitely worth it. No matter your target is a vampire or a werewolf, it will come in handy.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Wyrmling Skeleton
Description: Dragons, the true cryptid. Aliving dragon commands majestic power, while a dead one is still a trove of riches.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Incorrupt Monkeypaw
Description: A dried arm of a primate. Don't wish for anything from it, and that includes silent wishes as well.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Bogeyman
Description: Your children are right about the Bogeyman. As a parent, you better keep an eye out for these wicked kidnappers. But they can be lucrative. Catch one and it might help pay the bills because we're buying them! Call 098-1937**21 for details.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters.

Name: Golden Beetle
Description: They discern directions through the moisture of the soil and the change of light, looking forward to their moment of maturation.

Name: Clawed Pendulum
Description: It shall lead your way.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Goose Neck
Description: It bends its neck to take up the balance spring of the clock, take up precision, take up time itself.

Name: Winged Key
Description: Find an open space, hold the key handle firmly, and mentally recite your destination. It will lead you to the keyhole, in the form of a bird.

Name: Prophetic Bird
Description: An arcanist's best friend! Let this little birdie remember your spells for you. With over 5241 practical spells in its memory bank, this is the goto choice for busy arcanists!
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Holy Silver
Description: Everybody loves a pretty bullion of silver. Being washed in holy water not only gave them a beauteous sheen, but also powerful arcane energy and exorcist properties.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Bifurcated Skeleton
Description: What did the humans say again? Oh, what a poor, deformed little thing! But guess what the arcanists say. Oh my, look at these sublime features only evident in the noblest of all blood lines!
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Salted Mandrake
Description: Amandrake that does not scream? That must be the greatest thing in the history of Arcanum! Robert the Magnesia made a fortune with this and now lives in his very own manor.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Biting Box
Description: You won't be able to tell where it comes from, whom it belongs to or why it looks so strange. More importantly, you will never know what you have released.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Solidus
Description: Embark on a journey, or wait plainly.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Perpetual Cog
Description: All the secrets of time are hidden in the ceaseless turning of the gears.

Name: Cicada Wings
Description: Please store the wings away from the body, preferably in a cool place. Occasional trembling is normal; just wait for it to dry completely.

Name: Spell of Fortune
Description: Nobody would have thought that this item is the secret to good luck. The story of its origin begins with Marianna who worked at a family diner...
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Rough Silver Ingot
Description: A tad unrefined but still serviceable. Use it to cast arcane skills or buy a jar of jelly beans or cookies. The choice is yours.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Esoteric Bones
Description: Though not as superior as a full skeleton, the femur, ribs, and pieces of the skull are the optimal solution you can afford.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Milled Magnesia
Description: Usable in exorcism and purification rites. It may not be important, but we can't do without it.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Liquefied Terror
Description: You trembled in your dreams and suddenly woke up with a scream. They were running across your skin. Made with cracked teeth, the liquefaction has improved its stability and shelf life. Tasting it is not recommended as it brings more than just nightmares.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness, Pawnshop, Story
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Spell of Banishing
Description: It can take care of both thorough and daily cleaning. All it takes is a bit of money and your hands will be freed forever. What's more cheering than that?
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Silver Ore
Description: Precious metal can be extracted from these ores. It is also a casting medium for some basic arcane skills.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Shattered Bones
Description: Careful, this may be sharp. Of course, only fools will hurt themselves with this …. WHOA! Watch out!
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Magnesia Crystal
Description: It's not quite useful in high-level rituals. The seller promised that the part that looks like a human face was but a coincidence created by nature.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Trembling Tooth
Description: Always take good care of it and use it immediately after it is opened. Don't be surprised by these little ones' speed when they flee: they were freaked out before running away from the gum.
Usage: Insight or Resonate rituals of characters. Also used as the material for crafting advanced materials.

Name: Moment of Dissonance
Description: In your drenched dreams, in the shadowed paths you strolled alone, at the moment sudden restlessness shivers up your spine, you find it there.
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Brief Cacophony
Description: Over the bonfire that burns moths into charred ash, in the ephemeral silence among the cheers of the crowd, through the brief cacophony that stores within the embrace, you find it there.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness Pawnshop Fragment Shop: Oneiric
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Sonorous Knell
Description: On the stalker that has been tailing you, on the strange face that greets you on the other side of the mirror, in the sonorous knell that sends deafening reverberations, you find it there.
Source: Craft in the Wilderness Pawnshop Fragment Shop: Oneiric
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Sinuous Howl
Description: When the dappled shade of the tree falls on the ground, when the dried branch cracks under your feet, when the birds are scared away by the sinuous howl, you find it there.
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Interlaced Shudder
Description: When the suspension bridge is crumbling between the cliffs, when the man with tingling ears is walking on a wire, when the interlaced shudders cannot be stopped, you find it there.
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Hypocritical Murmur
Description: When the traveler stands at a deserted fork, when the hurricane takes the sand away, when the hypocritical murmur is haunting the skull, you find it there.
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: Hoarse Echo
Description: When tears are shed and eyes are closed at midnight, when a sigh cannot be ignored in one's solitude, when the hoarse echo sinks into the deep sea, you find it there.
Usage: A material for leveling up Character Resonate.

Name: LF Polarization
Description: Polarization whose extremely low amplitude makes it unobservable. It is mainly generated by stable mental images. It reaches the peak in 1-3 hours after the image is formed, and starts to vanish in 12-15 days.
Usage: A low-lever material used for ascending Psychube's level limit.

Name: MF Polarization
Description: This polarization of low amplitude can be seen continually when observed. It is mainly generated by long-lasting, mild mental images, such as sorrow and nostalgia.
Usage: A mId-lever material used for ascending Psychube's level limit.

Name: HF Polarization
Description: This polarization has high amplitude and is easy to observe, but it is less often seen compared to MF Polarization. It is mainly generated by strong and temporary mental images, such as anger, impulse and greed.
Usage: A high-lever material used for ascending Psychube's level limit.

Name: EHF Polarization
Description: Rare polarization of extremely high amplitude. It is mainly generated by extremely unstable mental images. Whoever sees it must centrifuge it immediately and inform the head of the department as soon as possible.
Usage: The highest-lever material used for ascending Psychube's level limit.

Name: Crystal Drop
Description: The Storm arrived and the rain drops rose into the skies as though returning to their mother's embrace and the blistering hot cauldron from which they came. But accidents might just happen. If they fail to reach the other side before the Storm ends, they will fall back to the earth.
Usage: Summoning and item purchases.

Name: Clear Drop
Description: The quiet twin, the most reliable of the siblings, and the one always giving help to those in need. It is armed with every virtue. It is the last raindrop to rise, and the first to return to the earth.
Usage: Summoning or restoring Cellular Activity.

Name: Unilog
Description: The golden rabbit is a well known myth. It spies on people, steals their time, and sometimes even changes their fates. Though it's old, decrepit, and stale, it is unique and indispensable.
Usage: Character summoning.

Name: Decalog
Description: The storyteller never thought that golden rabbits could travel in packs. Nobody knows what this might entails, but no one chooses one single rabbit over more of it.
Usage: Character summoning.

Name: Dust
Description: The glorious supreme law is nowhere to be found, but its power is great and beyond prediction. As it wanders, its dropping Dust also contains the energy for power increasing. It is, in a sense, part of the ultimate answer.
Usage: Leveling up characters.

Name: Sharpodonty
Description: A currency from the ancient, unrecorded era. It has 13 edges and a maw of razor sharp teeth which only opens to those with arcanist blood.
Usage: Everyone needs some of this.

Name: Track of the Lost
Description: Some people call it a tape, while more arcanists choose the name "Track of the Lost." It may have recorded a sad piece of rock music, an embarrassing monologue, a piece of white noise, or endless silence.
Usage: Can be exchanged for items at the [Bass Counter] in the Bank.

Name: Album of the Lost
Description: The loudest and best Track of the Lost. This means more rock and roll and more soliloquies with barely changing moments of silence and white noise. Passionate fans will deliver the Track to its destination, but you must understand that they're not doing this pro bono.
Usage: Can be exchanged for items at the [Treble Counter] in the Bank.

Name: Thought Element
Description: There are so many ways to organize the mess: the furnace that burns, the blade that cuts ….. but I wish to keep it the way it is.
Usage: Can be exchanged for items at the [Psychube Shop] in the Bank.

Name: Thoughts in Entirety
Description: As the disorganized has been organized, the darkened vision lightens, ideas are finally taking shape in my mind.
Usage: Can be exchanged for items at the [Psychube Shop] in the Bank.

Name: Oneiric FluId
Description: Snowflakes crushed by the wheels, pasture grass rustling in the wind, waves shattered against distant cliffs. Such sounds are insignificant but are recorded nonetheless. Again and again, till the very end.
Usage: Can be exchanged for items in the [Oneiric Shop] in the Bank.

Name: Crystal Casket
Description: The whispers inside are overflowing. Seize the opportunity when you get to hear them.
